sense.gloss: one's place (in society, etc.), one's position
main part, meat (as opposed to bone, skin, etc.), wood (as opposed to bark), blade (as opposed to its handle), container (as opposed to its lid)

sdata.j: ↑自分↑↓じぶん↓↑自|身|↑↓じしん↓に↑疑問↑↓ぎもん↓を↑持↑↓も↓つことは↑良識↑↓りょうしき↓の↑第一歩↑↓だいいっぽ↓だ。
sdata.e: To have doubts about oneself is the first sign of intelligence.

sdata.j: ↑物事↑↓ものごと↓は、ありのまま↑見↑↓み↓るのではなく、↑自分↑↓じぶん↓↑自|身|↑↓じしん↓をそこに↑見↑↓み↓る。
sdata.e: We don't see things as they are, but as we are.

sdata.j: ↑殺人↑↓さつじん↓↑犯↑↓はん↓は↑有罪↑↓ゆうざい↓↑判決↑↓はんけつ↓を↑受↑↓う↓けて↑終|身|↑↓しゅうしん↓↑刑↑↓けい↓に↑処↑↓しょ↓せられた。
sdata.e: The murderer was convicted and sentenced to life in prison.

sdata.e: You must learn to obey instructions.

sdata.e: You are the master of your own destiny.
